General.Name: Hillcrest Energy Technologies Ltd.
General.Description: Hillcrest Energy Technologies Ltd., a clean technology company, engages in developing high performance power conversion technologies and digital control systems for powertrains, charging sollutions, and grid-connected renewable energy generation and storage systems. The company was formerly known as Hillcrest Petroleum Ltd. and changed its name to Hillcrest Energy Technologies Ltd. in April 2021. Hillcrest Energy Technologies Ltd. was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
